mapper.insert: insert into eshop (title, brand, ogprice, dcprice, bigGenre, smallGenre, code, simpleExplain, shipPay, stuck, fsizes, fnames, uuid) values (#{title}, #{brand}, #{ogprice}, #{dcprice}, #{bigGenre}, #{smallGenre}, #{code}, #{simpleExplain}, #{shipPay}, #{stuck}, #{fsizes}, #{fnames}, #{uuid});
mapper.select: select AUTO_INCREMENT -1 eno from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_NAME = 'eshop';
